itemLocalData.text:
Rivet pack
A set of rivets that can be shot using a rivet gun.

Capacitor
A powerful battery that can fuel energy using weapons.

Tranquilizer Dart
Special ammunition for the tranquilizer. Causes enemies struck to go berserk.

Grenade
Goes boom! Just find a boomstick to go with it.

Rocket
Ammunition for missile launcher.

Scrap
Local currency.

FixKit
A set of tools and components that can fix damage in robots. Restores 75 health on use.

Body Plating
A set of heavy metal plates that can go in torso area. Will make you much more protected from damage but it will also slow you down significantly.
Can be installed in body module.

Suspended Body Plating
Composite armor plates coupled provide superior protection, while powerful actuators ensure no loss of movement speed.
Can be installed in body module.

Sensoric Body Module
This body set hides many useful tools and sensors. With it's help you can more efficiently salvage useful items from defeated enemies. Also provides small increase in durability.
Can be installed in body module.

Head Plating
A set of heavy plates that form a helmet. After all nobody wants their CPU sticking out from their head after taking a shot. Gives more durability.
Can be installed in head module.

Improved Head Plating
A set of composite armor for the head. Provides a good improvement in durability.
Can be installed in head module.

Head Sensors
A set of sensors and extra CPUs. Helps you think about secrets of the universe. Also will improve how much scrap is generated by defeating enemies.
Can be installed in head module.

Arms Plating
Heavy metal plates that can be installed in your arms. Provides a good boost in protection.
Can be installed in arms module.

Improved Arms Plating
A set of strong but light composite plates that can be installed in your arms. Provides an excellent durability boost at no cost to your speed.
Can be installed in arms module.

Sensoric Arms Module
A set of tools, sensors and possibly extra fingers. When installed, you will be able to open locked containers.
Can be installed in arms module.

Legs Plating
Heavy plates that can be installed in your legs. At a price of slowed movement speed and clumsiness, provide a good boost to durability.
Can be installed in legs module.

Actuator Legs Module
Springs and powerful pistons combined with light composite plating. Gives a small improvement to durability and provides a huge boost to your movement speed.
Can be installed in legs module.

Sensoric Legs Module
A set of extra pipes can deliver more fuel to leg motors and actuators. Provides a small boost to both durability and movement speed.
Can be installed in legs module.

Laser Rifle
Unlike what the name suggest it actually shoots plasma. Lasers would hit the enemy instantly. Well, at least projectile speed is still fast!
This weapon deals good damage, has high range and good ammo capacity.
Uses capacitors

Missile launcher
Shoots a missile that guides onto mouse pointer location. The missile starts slow but accelerates over time.
Excellent damage and range.
Uses rockets

Rivet Gun
While intended to be a tool to be used in industry, you can use it as a weapon.
Can be fired rapidly but has poor damage and accuracy issues.
Uses rivets

Taser
This pistol creates a large electric sparks that deals solid damage to all enemies it crosses.
Good damage but poor range.
Uses capacitors

Tranquilizer
This unique weapon fires a projectile that fries electronics. When hit, the target turns berserk and starts attacking everything around it.
Expensive and rare weapon.
Uses tranquilizer darts

Tube
It's actually a grenade launcher. Keep some distance between you and the target!
Deals huge damage to all targets in small radius of impact.
Uses grenades
